players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night and found out to be one. We need to discuss how we can safely eliminate him."
You: "Bob's message suggests he has information from last night, but we can't trust him yet. We need to discuss the possibilities and come up with a plan to figure out who the mafioso is."
You: "I think we should investigate Charlie and Bob tonight to see if either of them is the mafioso. If one of them is, it would be safer for us to eliminate them first."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I'm going to investigate him tonight. If he's not, then we can eliminate him tomorrow."
Charlie: "I will investigate Charlie tonight. If he's not the mafioso, I'll eliminate him tomorrow."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob
